title: Global Markets Rally on Economic Optimism
summary: Stocks surged worldwide as investors reacted to strong corporate earnings and signs of recovery in global trade.

title: New Discovery in Quantum Computing
summary: Scientists at MIT announced a breakthrough in quantum error correction, potentially speeding up practical quantum computers.

title: Wildfires Spread Across Southern Europe
summary: Firefighters are battling massive wildfires in Spain and Italy as temperatures soar to record levels.

title: Breakthrough in Cancer Research
summary: A new experimental treatment has shown promising results in shrinking tumors during clinical trials.

title: Tech Giants Face New Regulations in Europe
summary: The EU passed new digital laws that could reshape how big tech companies operate in the region.
